issue.title: [Website] Update governance page
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11876](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11876). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The governance wasn't updated when `[~wesm]` became the new PMC chair.

Other updates may be necessary (is the list of committers and PMC members generated automatically?).

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11876?focusedCommentId=17296255) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
The list of committers & PMC is in https://github.com/apache/arrow-site/blob/master/_data/committers.yml, so that's where you'd make the change indicating Wes as VP and to add any new contributors. The table on the website is generated from that yml.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11876?focusedCommentId=17296262) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Hmm, and it seems the authoritative committer and PMC list is here:
https://home.apache.org/phonebook.html

Perhaps we should take a pass and look for missing updates to the website.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11876?focusedCommentId=17301747) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 96
<https://github.com/apache/arrow-site/pull/96>
